thread.title: Anonymous customer
thread.title_full: Smart Start, Inc. reviewed by Anonymous customer

author: Anonymous customer
title: Anonymous customer
text: I was 10 minutes late for my appointment-install and I was told -no install because you are late- have to reschedule for 2 weeks from now. I called the corp # and had them call the largo location to let them know I was running late. It didn't matter-no install. I am concerned with retribution because I have to go back to that location in 2 weeks and I don't want to be "punished" for my review
